decision_conditions: The materials and finishes to be used for all external surfaces of the building hereby approved shall be as specified in the submitted document entitled External Surface Materials Rev C by Guy Logan (received 5 May 2023). The development shall be implemented only in accordance with these approved details.
description: Application for a Non-Material Amendment in (S96a) to allow approved PPC composite windows and doors by velfac" to be changed to "uPVC windows and doors" in relation to planning permission reference 203705FUL dated 24/08/2021 for 'Redevelopment of the site to provide a residential building of up to seven-storeys to accommodate 118 residential units together with associated pedestrian through-access, disabled car parking, cycle storage, private and communal amenity spaces, refuse and recycling storage, and hard and soft landscaping (following demolition of existing buildings).'
